body.name: Leeleberd Led Lights for Bedroom 100 ft (2 Rolls of 50ft) Music Sync Color Changing RGB Led Strip Lights with Remote App Control Bluetooth Led Strip, Led Lights for Room Home Kitchen Decor Party
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 16 mins
features: Music Sync Mode: Let your LED light strips 100 foot dance to the beat in real-time.Perfect for birthday parties, Christmas, Easter, Halloween, carnival, prom, wedding or everyday use because these RGB LED light bars can bring you a visual feast.

DIY Remote and APP Control:These LED strips are very easy to control via remote control or Bluetooth smart app, and 16 million colors with a large number of interesting modes can enhance the beauty of your room decor aesthetic.

100ft Extra Long Lighting: These RGB LED strip lights for bedroom 100 ft are long enough to decorate and colorize larger areas giving you more coverage and more design options. Suitable for bedrooms, kitchens, stairs, dining rooms, ceilings.
Easy Installation: It's easy to install and you can use the adhesive to mount the RGB LED strip lights 100 feet to any dry, clean surface.
Special Timer: The led lights for bedroom 100+ ft can be used as a light alarm clock, you can set the wake-up time and end time to turn it on/off automatically,Putting you in a good mood every day.
Multiple Scene Options: The light strip has 64 scene modes to create a festive atmosphere that matches your mood or activity.
Note: These 100 foot LED strip lights are not waterproof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THESE LIGHTS CAN BE TRIMMED
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted to add some backlight to my tv and for some reason the 100 ft lights were cheaper than the other lights with less footage. I saw lots of reviews complaining about the length and I honestly didn’t have any other need for these, so I looked up how to cut them and it was very easy. You have to cut right in the middle of the 4 connectors (see photo for reference). This is where the circuits are closed, so this will not damage any other lights if done correctly. I’m glad It worked out and I’m still able to use the remaining lights if I want to reconnect them. The remote has a weak signal, but it’s cheap so I didn’t expect anything fancy. I’ll try the app and see if it works a little better but for now, my lights are doing what they’re supposed to, no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical because these are so affordable, but they work great. Really easy to install. We have textured walls and I had no problem sticking them on. It's been a few weeks now and they haven't fallen down or anything. One of the purple settings acts like a blacklight which is cool. All the features work. My boys love these, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These LED lights were awsome!!
reviews.reviewText: The quality of these LED lights were absolutely amazing. Im a picky shopper and im always worried about how im spending my money even if its a gift card but these were 100% worth it. Theres an app that connects to them so you can control the colour even while being in a different room. Im buying a 2nd package of the same LED lights for my other room. 10/10!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Remote did not work
reviews.reviewText: The lights are great and wayyyy longer than I thought. One roll went around my entire room and down the side of one of my walls. The brightness of the lights is great, and they look very pretty. The remote control did come basically broken. When I got the lights, I used the remote twice to test it and when I went to finally set it on a color, it did not work. There is an app that you can download though which is what I use, and it works great, and it is really simple. Great lights overall just wished the remote actually worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its great but some cons
reviews.reviewText: i put them in my room and they looked good but after a while the remote would not work anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves these!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my son’s room to add a little more “flare” to it. These are a wonderful addition to his room! You can change the colors on a remote or with the app!Pros- quality is superb Easy to apply Comes with a remote Bright

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for our game room!
reviews.reviewText: These lights really added the extra pizazz that I needed to complete my boys game room in time for Christmas. Unfortunately, they only lasted a week because one of the boys bumped the plug and it shorted out the entire strip rendering it all useless. So this is my third purchase(second purchase was because I needed more lights!) And I'm hoping these last a lot longer because redoing a cloud ceiling is not a good time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!… but finicky
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am a college student and I got these lights for my new suite this year. I put them up just yesterday and they were working perfectly and all uniform. Although, at some point last night one small section of the LED strip turned a completely different color than what I set the lights to (as seen in the photo and video), and I still have not figured out how to fix it, but it does not bug me personally as it might for others.I also turned off the lights last night before bed and today when I went to turn them on they wouldn’t work…BUT I looked at the questions asked on Amazon for this product concerning the lights not turning on and many people said you just have to flip the plug in the wall outlet around. (Ex: if you initially have it plugged in and the small end is sticking out to the left, flip it so the small end is towards the right).Overall, it’s a good product I would say, but not the most elite lights. You get what you paid for essentially (as in these lights were pretty cheap so I figured they might have some quirks). I hope this helps future consumers!
